title: What are the best smartphones around 20k to 28k? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are plenty of smartphones in this price range having top notch features and top of the line hardware. The first one in this list is far below 20k and I am placing it on the first place only because it’s the best value for money phone from a well known and well established brand. I am not going into specs of each phone as you can easily get the specs from sites like gsmarena. So, here is the list lenovo Z2 plus (18k) 2. Xiomi Mi 5 (25k)  3. Xiaomi Mi Max prime (20k)  4. Moto Z Play (24k)  5. Asus Zenfone 3 (17k)  Its my personal choice but you can see the specs and choose according to you preferances.

You can have Xiaomi Mi 5, Xiaomi Mi Max, Samsung Galaxy A5 2016, HTC One M9 Plus, HTC Desire XC, HTC Desire 828, Sony Xperia M5 Dual, Samsung Galaxy A7 and some others. The choice is yours. Thank you.
